Name: team
Title: Team | AidIQ.com
Body:
Our Team

Fran Boon

Fran is passionate about applying technology to solve the world's problems. Since graduating from Oxford University, he has spent 20 years working with Oxfam, NetHope, Tactical Technology Collective, Sahana, Inveneo, Asterisk & OpenStreetMap. He has travelled extensively implementing systems & facilitating training courses & workshops including during major humanitarian disasters, such as Haiti & Indonesia, & longer-term sustainable development projects. Fran is the Managing Director for AidIQ & chair of the Sahana Eden Project Management Committee. His specific technology interests include Mapping (GIS) & Mobile solutions.

Dominic König

Dominic is a software developer from Sweden and Technical Director for AidIQ. He has developed large parts of the Sahana Eden core, and is a member of the Sahana Eden project management committee. His specialities include database design, open data standards and systems interoperability. Dominic is also a passionate nurse with 17 years of experience in intensive care.
